inscription:
Signature; Inscription

on verso, in pencil: [Night[crossed out]/The Window/GB/ George Bellows]
medium: Black conté crayon and graphite on hot press board
provenance: The artist, New York (until d. 1925); his wife, Emma S. Bellows, New York (1925-d. 1959); estate of Emma S. Bellows; [H.V. Allison & Co., New York; sold, 1959, to Daniels]; David M. Daniels, New York (1959–65; given, December 17, to MIA).
title: The Window
